AI Description: Libgcrypt is a general-purpose cryptographic library originally based on code from GnuPG. It provides various cryptographic algorithms to secure data and communications.
Core Features: Encryption & Decryption Functions, Symmetric-Key Algorithms (Aes, Camellia, Etc.), Public-Key Algorithms (Rsa, Dsa, Etc.), Hash Functions (Sha-1, Sha-256, Etc.), Random Number Generation
